transcript:
Customer: Karo yaar payment karao.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Yaha ek feeding machine me baat ho rahi hai Mr. Chauhan se?

Executive: Haan. Haan ji bataiye.

Executive: Hi, good afternoon. Main Amita baat kar rahi thi sir relationship manager IndiaMART office se. Kaise ho aap?

Customer: Kahan se?

Executive: IndiaMART office se baat kar rahi thi relationship manager Amita.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Haan sir abhi aapki baat ho rahi thi aapke account manager Kumari Ekta se regarding your services. To jaise aapne bataya kuch buyleads ka issue aapko aa raha tha right aur aapne not satisfied complaint bhi diya hai that you are not satisfied with the leads you are getting fake leads right?

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Kis tarike ka matlab aap mujhe thoda sa ek idea de denge kyunki yahan par mention hai that you got frustrated regarding all these leads. I am so sorry for the inconvenience which has caused by us. Main uske liye dil se sorry bol rahi hu aapko agar is tarike ka kuch issues aa rahe hain. Aap please bataiye so that main isko buyleads team ko at least highlight kar paun ki jo hum buyleads consume kar rahe hain wahan pe buyer aapko kya bolta hai after consuming that buyleads Mr. Chauhan.

Customer: Pehle to ek buylead jo thi jo ek mahine se aap mujhe idhar baat kar rahe ho idhar baat karke bata rahe ho. Aisa ek mahine se chal raha hai us buylead ki hum baat karte hain step by step baat.

Customer: To unhone lena tha animal automatic feeder machine.

Customer: Kya search kiya tha customer ne animal automatic feeder machine.

Customer: Aur main banata hu automatic feeder machine jo ki lohe ke sath related hai sheet ke sath related hai animal se kuch lena dena mera hai nahi. To agar customer ne likha hai ki mere ko animal auto feeder machine chahiye to aap log mujhe auto feeder machine keh ke mere ko bech kyun rahe ho animal word jo tha wo aapne miss kar diya isliye mera loss ho gaya pura ek lead ka loss ho gaya.

Executive: Achha wo word ki wajah se bas wo animal jo animal word hai wo wahan par nahi tha.

Customer: Haan agar customer ne search kiya hai animal to aapne animal mita kyun diya agar animal isme word hota to main lead nahi leta ki chalo mere layak nahi hai wo. Lekin aapne lead dene ke chakkar mein animal word jaan bujh ke mitaya ho ya to system ne mitaya ho meri galti nahi hai. Mera to loss ho chuka hai na.

Executive: Hmm main samajh rahi hu basically dekhiye sir hota kya hai products jo bhi keywords hote hain na jo bhi buyleads aati hain wo according to the keywords hai na.

Customer: Dekho dekho jab main IndiaMART mein baat karta hu ki mera loss ho gaya to IndiaMART har baar jo certification hota hai ek hi cheez aapne matlab deewar par chipka ke rakhi hai ki aise process jo hai wo samjha de. Mere ko process nahi samajhna hai.

Executive: Are nahi nahi sir ye galat ye galat samajh rahe hain main aapko process nahi samjhana chah rahi hu. Aap keh rahe hain na aapne bheja aap keh rahe hain na aapne wo buylead bheji aapki wajah se sir buyer jo bhi product ka name mention karta hai wo keyword pakde jaate hain accordingly buyleads verified hoti hain.

Customer: Haan koi bhi koi dikkat nahi hai lekin animal word bhi usne search kiya tha aisa aapne team ne hi bata diya.

Executive: Achha to animal miss kyun kar diya aapne?

Executive: Chaliye wo cheez main yahan par wo wo wo cheez main update karti hu iske alawa aur kaun si buylead thi ek to ye aap bata rahe hain.

Customer: Haan dekho wo to ek haan wo mere ko ek lead ka loss ho gaya iske liye ek word ke liye.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Wo mera isme kuch galti nahi. Aap mere ko aapne mere ko muft mein wo lead diya bhi nahi hai.

Customer: Paisa leke lead diya hai to main kyun bhala aisa waste jo aap data hai wo main lu abse aapki galti hai wo animal shabd jo word tha wo mitane ka.

Customer: Aur dusri baat kare.

Customer: Kaafi sare customer keh rahe hain kaafi sare customer to bole hi nahi jaate customer to tab hota hai jab jo rupya ka aadan pradan rehta hai transaction hota hai money ka. Jo lead jo aap de rahe ho wo itni worst lead hai matlab bekar lead hai ki un logon ko kuch matlab kuch lena hi nahi tha. Call karta hu to kehte hain mere papa ko papa ko puch ke bataunga bade bhai ko puch ke bataunga wo to maine aise hi search kar diya tha main to dekh raha tha main to price janne ke liye search kiya tha isme main kya karu. Agar price janne ke liye kiya hai to price maine lakhi hui hai yahan se jaan lete. Aap mujhe buylead ke form mein kyun de rahe ho rupya leke mere paas se.

Executive: Hmm.

Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: Dekho sir main aapko batati hu. Aap please mera concern thoda sa samjhiega main aapki problem samajh rahi hu main is cheez ko bhi kar rahi hu.

Customer: Process main jaan ke process mein jaan ke tang ho chuka hu IndiaMART mein kya chal raha hai mere ko kuch lena dena nahi hai. Mere ko jo data de rahe ho matlab mere layak nahi diya hai aap.

Executive: Sir buyleads aapko jo hum de rahe hain daily basis pe aap active hain meri baat ko aap suniyega please iska request hai. Aaj jo buyleads dekhiye meri baat suniye buyleads dekho sabse pehli cheez main yahan check kar pa rahi hu jo aap buyleads consume kar rahe hain aap buyleads consume kar rahe hain 4 se 24 ghante ke baad ki theek hai ya uske andar ki.

Customer: Nahi har 24 ghante ke baad ki hogi.

Executive: Sir suniye sir suniye ek minute ek minute mere ko suniye abhi abhi mere ko suniye abhi mere ko suniye pehle customer main hu customer main hu customer main hu.

Executive: Sir main bahut der se sun rahi hu lekin aap sunna nahi chah rahe hain.

Customer: Kyun sunna nahi chah rahe hain aap char ghante ke baad ki baat karo please char ghante ke andar maine buylead li hai wo kya bataiye na.

Executive: Chauhan sahab.

Customer: Boli char ghante ke baad ki lead mujhe chahiye nahi ignore kar dijiye pure ka pura ignore kar dijiye yahan pe abhi uske baad word nahi bolne ka.

Executive: Aadha to dijiye aadhe shabdon ko pakad ke sentence mat banaiye.

Customer: Ek minute ek minute ek minute char ghante ke baad ki buylead mere paas ki hai na chalo chhod dijiye char ghante ke andar ki buylead baat kijiye isme aapne kya diya kya kuch.

Executive: Chauhan sahab Chauhan sahab shanti rahiye pehle meri puri baat suniye aap aadhe aadha word pakad ke sentence mat banaiye.

Customer: Aap repeated repeated aap hai na question badlate ho change karte ho aapki baat wahi rehti hai to customer frustrated hota hi hai aapki baat mein matlab repetition hi hai.

Executive: Sir aap mujhe bolne ka mauka nahi diya aapne mujhe.

Customer: Bataiye abhi aap bol rahe the aaiye abhi boliye sir aap boliye.

Executive: Aap bata rahe the aap bata rahe the.

Customer: Haan par main bata raha hu na aap bol rahe the na ki char ghante ke baad mein main baat kar raha hu buy kar raha hu chalo char ghante ke baad ki main chhod deta hu to wo lead chahiye nahi meri galti ho gayi bhai char ghanta ho gaya maine buy kiya char ghante ke andar jo maine buy lead kiya hai usme kitna percentage hai wo lead ka ratio usme se hum baat karte hain chalo.

Customer: Batao char ghante ke andar ka kya.

Executive: Sir aap bol lijiye jab aapka complete ho jaye tab aap mujhe bataiyega.

Customer: Haan mera mera complete ho gaya aap mera complete ho gaya char ghante ke andar aap bataiye.

Executive: Sir sir chillaiye mat.

Customer: Mera complete ho gaya.

Executive: Aap par mera complete ho gaya mera complete ho gaya.

Executive: Chillaiye mat.

Customer: Chilla kyun raha hu main.

Executive: Main bahut politely aapko cheez samjhana chah rahi thi aap chillana chalu kar diya is resolution mil jayega.

Customer: Are par abhi abhi chilla raha hu main.

Executive: Aapne meri puri baat nahi suni maine char ghante bola ek minute maine char ghante bola aapne cheekhna chillana chalu kar diya aapne lekin puri baat suni.

Customer: Are main kya bolna chah rahi hu aapko.

Executive: Char ghanta word mein main sir do sir suno sir aap agar unchi aawaz mein baat karenge resolution nahi mil payega kyun sir aap bhi jante hain sir is tarike se koi bhi cheez nahi sambhalti right uske liye pehle aap shanti se to aap jawab nahi dete hain.

Executive: Shanti se sunne aap main to jawab de rahi hu aap sun hi nahi rahe hain aap ek hi cheez ko pakad ke aap sunna hi nahi chahte hain.

Customer: Bataiye abhi chalo chalo bataiye fir abhi maine bolna tha na bol diya.

Executive: Dekhiye aapki buyleads jo hoti hain buyleads jo hoti hain verified hoti hai aapke product location ke basis pe buyleads ko verified karke hi post kiya jata hai isse pehle bhi aapne do teen baar bataya check kiya team ne aapko wo buylead reverse back bhi kara balance ab meri baat ko pehle complete hone dijiyega aap mujhe bata rahe hain ki buylead buyer kehta hai main check kar raha tha buyer ne bola main price puch raha tha aapne prices dal rakhe hain bilkul agree kar rahi hu ye cheez galat hai but sir aapke alawa char se paanch supplier aur same buylead ko consume karte hain jitni jyada latest buylead uthayenge utne jyada conversion ke chances badhenge ab maine agar ek buyer ki buylead uthai wo buylead mere paas aayi hui hai pichle din ki ya 12 ghante baad ki ya 24 ghante ki ho sakta hai mujhse pehle kisi aur supplier ne baat kar li ho agar ek client ko char se paanch supplier kahin na kahin baat kar rahe hain ho sakta hai unki deal close ho gayi ho ho sakta hai unka kahin pe baat chal raha ho follow up chal raha ho to unhone aapko ye baat bol di main wahi cheez aapse confirm karna chah rahi hu aise kitne aapko buyer mile jahan par unhone ye bola ki deal close ho chuki hai ya fir maine sirf check karne ke liye call kiya tha ya jo bhi ek negative feedback aap batana chah rahe hain main aapko ye jaanna chah rahi thi kitna percent kyunki main yahan check kar rahi hu buylead jo aap daily consume kar rahe hain usme mostly buylead main dekh pa rahi hu abhi initially aapne jo shuru kiya hai aapne latest buylead uthai hai zero se char ghante ki lekin usse pehle jo aapne buylead uthai hai sir wo thodi si purani hai ho sakta hai buyer ki kahin aur baat chal gayi ho isliye unhone aapko aisa feedback diya right to main bas ye cheez aapko kehna chah rahi thi Chauhan ji main Ekta ko bolti hu wo aapko latest GST verified buyleads jahan par buyer ki GST bhi verified hui ho IndiaMART ke end se wo wale buyleads ke link aapko whatsapp pe share kare main aapko ye cheez samjhana chah rahi thi aap lekin sunne ke mood mein nahi the main samajh sakti hu paisa diya hai business nahi aa raha kahin na kahin gussa niklega but sir samne wale ko bhi thoda sa mauka de bolne ka so that main aapko jo cheeze hain wo samjha paun.

Customer: Abhi main kuch bolu.

Executive: Haan bilkul boliye bilkul boliye Chauhan sahab.

Customer: Bolu.

Executive: Bilkul bilkul.

Customer: Haan. Haan aapne bataya ki char ghante ke baad purana maine buylead buy kiya ho gaya chalo koi dikkat nahi to aisa kitna percentage hai wo mujhe pehle aap bataiye ki jisme maine char ghante ke andar buylead kiya hai.

Executive: Sir wo mujhe dikh raha hai yahan pe around 41% aur abhi agar starting is mahine ki baat karu to.

Customer: Ek minute ek minute 41 ko wo pakad ke chalte hain 41 percentage aisa buylead hai ki isme maine instantly matlab char ghante ke andar jo buylead kiya hai buy ho gaya to 41 jo rehta hai na uske related jo baat karo 41 mein se 9 9.99 percentage aise hain ki jo buyer ne bata diya utha ke.

Executive: Achha.

Executive: Okay okay theek hai.

Executive: Matlab approx 9% 10% client 41 mein se aisa mila jinhone baat nahi kare.

Customer: 9 percentage nahi 99.99 keh raha hu.

Executive: Achha 99.9 keh rahe hain aap.

Customer: Haan to abhi aap kehte ho ek minute nahi hui hai agar aap aise keh rahe ho ki nahi aisa to nahi ho sakta hai wo logically nahi hai to aap mujhe 41 ka 0.01 percentage nikal ke kitni buylead hoti hai kitna change hota hai bata dijiye main maan lunga ki main galat hu.

Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi main aapka concern samajh rahi hu main us cheez ke liye mana nahi kar rahi hu agar aisa kuch issue aa raha hai main ek kaam karti hu main team se is cheez ko connect karati hu aur main Ekta ko bolti hu wo aapko daily.

Customer: Connect karane se kya hoga wo bataiye.

Executive: Sir buylead department wo check karenge na verification mein.

Customer: 9 mahine se madam wahi sun raha hai.

Executive: Samajh rahi hu bilkul problem samajh rahi hu aapki main mana nahi kar rahi hu aap apni jagah bilkul sahi hain IndiaMART mein aur aap customer ko aisa aisa ghumate ja rahe ho ghumate ja rahe ho pata hai abhi char ghante ke baad to main buylead mere layak wo uska bhi nahi karta hu agar kisi ko matlab dicooler lena hota hai na to char ghante ke baad main dicooler ka bhi nahi buy kar raha hu galti se kuch kuch ho jata hai warna main pata hai kyun nahi kar raha hu pata hai aap logon ki ghatiya wajah se.

Customer: Kya bola aapne dobara.

Customer: 20 20 lakh ka machine aap logon ki ghatiya wajah se wo char ghante ke baad mein mera jo matlab related customer hai na uska bhi buylead nahi consume kar raha hu kyunki aap batane wale ho aapko bahana chahiye ki aapne char ghante ke baad buylead kiya hai.

Executive: Achha.

Customer: Main aapko wo bahana nahi dena chah raha hu.

Executive: Sir main na ek kaam karti hu senior manager se main aapki call arrange kara rahi hu theek hai.

Customer: Kya hoga senior manager se?

Customer: Rupya ke hath mein hai abhi maine jo rupya diya na rupya diya na uske hath mein hai.

Customer: Usko baat karwaiye senior se kuch nahi hoga.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Director se baat karwaiye.

Executive: Kara dijiye.

Customer: Director se.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer is not satisfied with the service.

- Customer wants to talk to director.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive offered to connect with senior manager.

- Executive offered GST verified buyleads link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call with senior manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer service, gst
